doc.title: The Wednesday Play

credit.role: Colonel Albrecht Sir Mertz von Quirnheim
Undergraduate at Party/Undergraduate in President's Office
Colonel Claus Schenk Count von Stauffenberg
Court Clerk at The Old Bailey
Undergraduate at Party/Undergraduate in President's Office
Sir John, as a young man
Barney the tallyman, in the washhouse

doc.plot: Series of one-off plays made by BBC television which gave breaks a wide range of writers and directors in the late 60s, such as Dennis Potter, Ken Loach, David Mercer, John Hopkins. Famous plays include 'Up the Junction' , 'Cathy Come Home' , 'Stand Up Nigel Barton' , 'Vote, Vote, Vote For Nigel Barton', 'On the Eve of Publication' and 'Son of Man'. The series often addressed controversial issues such as homelessness and abortion.
